verifyLocation

public static void verifyLocation(Context context,
                                  AdCNXCountryManager.COUNTRY_CODE[] targetCountries,
                                  Location userLocation,
                                  AdCNXLocationListener listener)
Method to call before loading up the adConnectLibrary that verifies that the user of your app is indeed in one of the countries you wish target with our library.

Parameters:
targetCountries - - Array of country codes the developer wishes to use the adConnect library in.
userLocation - - A location object if the app has access to that info. (null otherwise)
listener - - Listener that will be called once the location of the user has been checked on the adConnect servers.

doActivate

public static boolean doActivate(double activationRate)
For publishers that only wish to activate a certain percentage of this library. Ideally, in code, this method should be called first before creating an instance of the library.

usage: 
        //We wish to only use this library in 30% of our apps.
        int ADCONNECT_ACTIVATION_RATE = 30;
 
        if(AdBlock.doActivate(ADCONNECT_ACTIVATION_RATE)
        {
                AdBlock lib = new AdBlock();
        }
 
        else
        {
                useAnotherVendor();
        }

Parameters:
activationRate - - Desired percentage of activated libraries. This should be a number between [0.0-100.0].
Returns:
True- if the library should be activated/created. False otherwise.
